OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study . Patients receive irinotecan IV 1 hour follow epirubicin IV 5 minute day 1 8 . Courses repeat every 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Sequential dose escalation epirubicin follow sequential dose escalation irinotecan . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos epirubicin irinotecan maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede 2 6 patient experience dose-limiting toxicity . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 3-30 patient accrue study .
